actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 so as to exempt private vessels and aircraft entering or departing from the United States at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Exempts, under the Tariff Act, private vessels and aircraft entering or departing from the United States at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees, and for other purposes. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1451)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 so as to exempt private vessels and aircraft entering or departing from the United States at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees, and for other purposes.
